Event.name: Vehicle_departure_initial_stage
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Vehicle</fen> moves into position or otherwise changes configuration or state as preparation for normal operation. The focus of the event is on the state of the <fen>Vehicle</fen> rather than any agent which is manipulating the <fen>Vehicle</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Vehicle">The flight for New York</fex> <fex name="Time">finally</fex> <t>lifted off</t> <fex name="Source">from Oakland International</fex> <fex name="Depictive">with one hundred passengers aboard</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Vehicle
Arg.definition: <def-root>The vehicle which moves into position for typical operation.</def-root>

Arg.name: Source
Arg.definition:
<def-root>Any expression which describes the location that the <fen>Vehicle</fen> has been stationed at.
<ex>The ship <t>cast</t> <t>off</t> <fex name="Source">from Pier 21</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Intended_goal
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The location that the <fen>Vehicle</fen> is bound for.
<ex>At 3:15 the airplane <t>took off</t> <fex name="int">to England</fex>. </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any description of the preparation for motion which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly</ment>, <ment>loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). It may also indicate salient characteristics of the <fen>Vehicle</fen> that affect the action (<ment>presumptuously</ment>, <ment>coldly</ment>, <ment>deliberately</ment>, <ment>eagerly</ment>, <ment>carefully</ment>). <ex>The airship <fex name="Manr">slowly</fex> <t>lifted off</t> and rotated to face the center of the city.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root>The state of the <fen>Vehicle</fen> during the preparations.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An event in which the <fen>Vehicle</fen> participates which causes or enables it to travel.
<ex>This experimental aircraft <t>lifts off</t> <fex name="mea">by rearranging its wings and thrusters to achieve maximal elevation in as short a time as possible</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Result
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Result</fen> of the <fen>Vehicle</fen>'s motion.
<ex>The plane <t>lifted off</t> <fex name="Result">right into some trees</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Co-participant
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An individual or vehicle that is also involved in the preparations.
<ex>A representative of the department said that the helicopter <t>took off</t> <fex name="Co-participant">with three other aircraft</fex>, arriving at the hospital in just under an hour.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates the <fen>Circumstances</fen> under which the preparation of the <fen>Vehicle</fen> takes place.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> describes the location where the <fen>Vehicle</fen> prepares for motion.</def-root>

Arg.name: Duration_of_final_state
Arg.definition: <def-root>The length of the time that the <fen>Vehicle</fen> remains in the state of readiness.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Vehicle</fen> gets ready for motion.
<ex>The helicopter <t>took off</t> <fex name="Time">in the afternoon of October 9th</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> is a proposition from which the main clause logically follows.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: lift off.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: elevate above the ground in preparation for flight.

lexUnit.name: take off.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: elevate above the ground in preparation for flight.

lexUnit.name: cast off.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: (of ships) be set free of moorings.
